name: The Masked Defenders (Ian Lythe)
description:
The City of Cascadia is in peril as a resurgence of super powered villains rock the Ocean city. A government controlled team of superheroes rise up to combat this new threat. 

Take on the role as a government agent tasked with ensuring that these superheroes succeed in their efforts to restore the peace. Along the way unravel a conspiracy that may shake the city down to its core, and maybe make a few friends along the way.


Love it? Hate it? Need to say something about it? Feel free to send an ask on my Tumblr at https://ian-lythe.tumblr.com
